Package Boundary.Admin

Class editSettings

java.lang.Object
Boundary.BaseMenu
Boundary.Admin.editSettings
public class editSettings extends BaseMenu
This allows the admin to access the edit setting menu.

    • load

      Loads the edit settings Menu.
      Specified by:

    • showMenu

      public void showMenu()
      Shows the content of the Menu that will be loaded into the edit settings menu and accepts user input to pick which option they want to use.

    • add_Holiday

      public void add_Holiday()
      Function to add in the public holidays. It will ask the user for the date of the holiday, then the name If there is a holiday on that date it will throw an error to the user. else, the holiday and name will be added to the system

    • deleteHolidays

      public void deleteHolidays()
      Function to delete the public holidays that were added in the system.

    • updateHolidays

      public void updateHolidays()
      Function to edit the details of the public holidays.

    • changeCinemaPrice

      public void changeCinemaPrice()
      Function to edit the cinema price in the system.

    • changeTop5

      public void changeTop5()
      Function to change the how the list top 5 movie option is shown for the user. if the value is review, the user can only show top 5 movie by review. Similar to sales. If the option is set to "both", the user can choose how to view top 5 movie list

    • addNewAdmin

      public void addNewAdmin()
      Function to add new admin account into the system.

    • deleteAdmin

      public void deleteAdmin()
      Function to delete admin account into the system.
